description:
Amber Werchon presents to the Market, 15 Robur Crescent Mountain Creek, a perfectly positioned home offering relaxed, low maintenance living within Brightwater Estate.

Have you been dreaming of a modern low maintenance home with Solar and Rain Water tank, a master bedroom with walk-in-robe and ensuite, north facing outdoor alfresco area and a fantastic location just minutes to Brightwater Lake/playground and Mooloolaba beach? Then don't miss out on 15 Robur Crescent, Mountain Creek!

With high ceilings and ducted climate control throughout, this home is easily enjoyed. There are three spacious bedrooms with fans and built-ins plus a study. The master bedroom at the rear of the home has direct backyard access through to the alfresco deck. Other features of the master room are ensuite with stone vanity tops and designer tiling as well as a custom fitted walk-through robe.

The centre of the home is dedicated to living, with a vast open plan living and dining area integrating with the spacious kitchen featuring waterfall stone benches, pendant lights, stainless steel appliances and room for a double door fridge.

The design is clever, allowing for a under main roof alfresco deck with newly installed outdoor Sun shades and overlooks a grassed backyard for children or pets. For the environmentally conscious a 5,000 litre water tank is used for the garden irrigation and the 6.6kw solar panels will help you keep your home cool in summer with no extra bills.

Offering designer touches that surpass similar homes in the area, this Brightwater home offers exceptional value in a commanded estate with lakes, one of the best children's playgrounds and BBQ area ($1.2 million dollar Brightwater park) that are located next to the Aldi shopping precinct including a chemist, coffee shop, liquor store, Stepz Fitness gym and childcare facilities.

The low-maintenance home is ideally located in the Brightwater State School (primary) and Mountain Creek State School (secondary) catchment zones. If you enjoy bike rides or long runs, the Mooloolah River National Park is just a stone's throw away, where you can ride or walk for kilometres.

This is a home that will tick so many boxes, so make sure you call Terri-Anne or Todd today for your own private inspection.
